named-query.name: securityGroup.getById
named-query.query: SELECT sg FROM SecurityGroup sg WHERE sg.id = :id

named-query.name: securityGroup.getAll
named-query.query: SELECT sg FROM SecurityGroup sg order by name

named-query.name: securityGroup.getDefaultSecurityGroups
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT sg FROM SecurityGroup sg LEFT OUTER JOIN SecurityGroupFilter sgf ON sgf.securityGroup = sg WHERE sgf.objectId IS NULL

named-native-query.name: securityGroup.getRoleBasedSecurityGroups
named-native-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT sg.id, sg.name FROM security_group sg LEFT JOIN security_group_filter sgf ON sg.id = sgf.security_group_id LEFT JOIN role r ON r.id = sgf.object_id LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN users u ON ur.user_id = u.id WHERE sgf.object_type = 'ROLE' AND u.id = :userId

named-native-query.name: securityGroup.getInstrumentBasedSecurityGroups
named-native-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT sg.id, sg.name FROM security_group sg LEFT JOIN security_group_filter sgf ON sg.id = sgf.security_group_id WHERE sgf.object_type = 'INSTRUMENT' AND sgf.object_id in :instrumentIds

named-native-query.name: securityGroup.getAllInstrumentBasedSecurityGroups
named-native-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT sg.id, sg.name FROM security_group sg LEFT OUTER JOIN security_group_filter sgf ON sg.id = sgf.security_group_id WHERE sgf.object_type = 'INSTRUMENT'
